title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park        Wrangell Mountains and Copper River    Â    Volunteer With Us! The park has volunteer and internship positions available each summer. Many of these positions are posted through the Student Conservation Association (SCA). You can find out more about volunteering in Wrangell-St. Elias or in other land management agencies on our Volunteering webpage.   The National Park Service Centennial The National Park Service is celebrating its 100th anniversary in 2016. We have partnered with the National Park Foundation to celebrate this achievement. Please visit the National Park Foundation website to find out how you can support national parks during our centennial and the years to come!
